meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Vanderbilt Lisa Spardel-Krol Dave Leach Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6280.

td.p: Tom Vanderbilt, a writer from Brooklyn, New York
Lisa Spardel-Krol, an educational marketer from Watertown, Massachusetts
Dave Leach, a software analyst from Atlanta, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,599)

tr.td: THE 1820s
COMPLETE THE MOVIE QUOTE
"A"NATOMY
THE MOST EXPENSIVE EVER
MUSEUMS OF GERMANY
SILENT LETTERS

div.h3: Scores at the first commercial break (after clue 15):

tr.td: Dave
Lisa
Tom

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Dave
Lisa
Tom
NATIONAL PARKS OF THE WORLD
BRITISH NOVELS BY CHARACTERS
(Alex: We'll give you the characters.)
"RE"SEARCH
(Alex: Each correct response will begin with "R-E".)
THINK OF THE CHILDREN!
AT BAT
ON DECK

tr.td: It's the term for sums of money sent back to their homelands by immigrants in the U.S.
